column5: Thinking about picking up this one  https://www.govdeals.com/index.cfm?fa=Main.Item&itemid=26&acctid=8074  Anything I should watch out for in a used boat? What kind of riggers would fit best?

Thinking about picking up this one  https://www.govdeals.com/index.cfm?fa=Main.Item&itemid=26&acctid=8074  Anything I should watch out for in a used boat? What kind of riggers would fit best?  it may induce romance, be careful with taking ladies out on it.
do not use it during migratory bird hunt season on lake simcoe it wouldnt last an hour
does the tail double as a tiller? If so...buy it
is the trolling motor chain driven?
Actually it looks like a wreck. This liberal govt will sell anything
Leah wants it for the lake!!
Leah wants it for the lake!! The pedals are broke out of the brackets...you will have to swim behind and kick your feel real hard...carefull of that rudder
Leah wants it for the lake!! have you not done enough damage Wayne
